name: Gyro Bandits
description:
Gyro Bandits is an arcade action game where you must survive in a space gunfight for as long as you can.

  • To do this, you tilt your device sideways to track your enemies down, and then tap the screen to shoot at them.
  • The shootout will gradually start to heat up, and your reflexes will be put to the test, as you fight different kinds of enemies, each with its own combat strategy, some of them directly related to the tilt movement.
  • Also, you won't want them to be there for long, because they may turn aggressive and start firing and moving faster.
  • You can defend yourself by shooting incoming projectiles or batting them away.
  • It features a single global leaderboard, to encourage competitive gameplay.
  • A fresh and catchy soundtrack!
